title: Liali, the Shadow of Hope
body:
Liali, the Shadow of Hope

https://imgur.com/bgzESja

Theme:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rmhDi9zhBQs

Full Name: Liali Chaaya Natsuki (Meaning: Determined Shadow of Hope)
Sex: Female
Age: 18
Type: Melee, Mage
Damage Type: Mixed
Origin: Ionia
Weapon: Katana infused with Shadow Magic

Teachers: Shen during the peace era of Ionia as she grew up till she was 14, then Zed during the Noxian invasion to control her shadow power, ending with Yasuo to find peace with her inner self and to find the courage to pick up her curst weapon.

(Passive) Shadow Cruelty - Passive: Everytime Liali hurts an enemy, that enemy is infected with Bane. 

Bane: .5% (+ .5% per 100 AP) of enemy's health is infected, those stacks stay till death. When 10% of enemies health is infected, they lose 5% of their defensive stats permanently until the stacks are removed. When 75% of an enemies health is infected, Liali can execute that enemy.

(Q) Wolf Claw - First Cast: After a .5 second-delay, Liali slashes with her sword to deal Attack damage physical damage to all enemies in the target direction, applying on-hit effects to the first target hit.

(Q) Wolfs Anger - Second Cast: Liali casts Wolfs Anger. If it hits an enemy, Liali can gain another Wolfs Anger stack to which she can cast Wolf Howl.

(Q) Wolf Howl - Third Cast: Liali unleashes a dark slash that travels an increased distance in the target direction, dealing bonus damage.

(W) Shadow Dance - Active: Liali summons a shadow wolf in a target direction, that clone will run for 3 seconds until recast and Liali switches places with that clone.
(W) Passive: When switching with a clone, Liali gains bonus attack speed and movement speed.

(E) Inner Torture - Active: Liali throws a shadow ball. If the shadow ball hits an enemy target, the target loses health depending on how much of enemies health is infected with Bane. If it misses, it creates a zone that damage enemies passing it, dealing magic damage every .5 seconds.

(R) Shadow Master - Active: Liali enters True Stealth for 2 (+ .5 seconds per 100 AD) seconds, and will not break the stealth if she attacks. Enemies near Liali will be infected with Bane every .5 seconds.
(R) Balancing: Liali is limited to basic attacking only, executing an enemy will break the stealth.

looks like akali but not a garbage waifu

true stealth for 6 seconds? that would mean that if you ult you can basically just run around your opponent and auto attack him to death on lane...
I would reduce the time of true stealth and/or make it scale.
Also, her passive needs 20 stacks to reach 10% in early game, and then they only loose 5% armor and MR? I don't know, how often those stacks need to be refreshed, but it would take a long time to proc her passive and even then it wouldn't have so much influence on the game... what i dont understand is, if they loose that defense stats permanently or only for some time?
I would rework that passive, but i do like the idea of stacking hits on enemy champions.

Was that actually drawn by you? Cause wow she is so pretty.

I'm not super good with the whole stats/ability thing, but I do think that her r being only a stealth move is a bit odd. It's a good escape but doesn't have much affect in terms of a fight. It kind of reminds me of Eve stealth but on her R instead? Maybe have it so that if R is active, a third of your bane you have on someone is added on top of any enemies marked, so when you get out of stealth you have a better chance at killing them? If I'm not wrong she reminds me of an assassin.

I did not draw her.

My intention was not to make an Assassin, but she turned out like one. I was going for a more Yasuo style fighter. But in the end, I am happy with the result and I will not be doing much more to her kit.

Liali is able to attack during her stealth, which will be game breaking. Then I saw what you wrote and I added a little more to it, not in the way you suggested, but just so it does not look underwhelming.

Thanks for the comment.

GL HF
